text: TNT has released the official trailer for limited series I Am The Night ( fka One Day She â€™ ll Darken ), from executive producer and director Patty Jenkins, and starring Chris Pine, who also executive produces. The project reteams Jenkins and Pine, who worked together on Wonder Woman. Inspired by true events, I Am the Night tells the incredible story of Fauna Hodel ( India Eisley ) who was given away at birth. As Fauna begins to investigate the secrets to her past, she follows a sinister trail that swirls ever closer to an infamous Hollywood gynecologist, Dr. George Hodel ( Jefferson Mays ), a man involved in the darkest Hollywood debauchery. Pine plays Jay Singletary, a former Marine - turned - hack - reporter / paparazzo
